error_details.explanation: Incorrect operand. It appears the student used the number of seashells from Paul (24), instead of the combined seashells from Henry and Paul- Leo must have collected 59-24=35 seashells.

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 201/4
Henry and Paul collected a total of 11+24 = <<11+24=35>>35 seashells
To make a total of 59, Leo must have collected 59-24 = <<59-24=35>>35 seashells
He gave out a quarter of 35 seashells which is 35*(1/4) = <<35*(1/4)=35/4>>35/4 seashells
They are now left with 59-35/4 = <<59-35/4=201/4>>201/4 seashells
